SELECT tm.menu_id AS id, tm.menu_name AS title, tm.parent_menu_id, tm.menu_url, tm.depth, tm.auth_seqno FROM tb_menu tm WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM tb_menu_auth tma WHERE tma.menu_id = tm.menu_id AND ( (#{u_type} = 'A' AND tma.member_type IN ('A', 'CUSTOMER')) OR tma.member_type = #{u_type} ) ) AND tm.depth = 0 ORDER BY tm.menu_seqno

SELECT tm.menu_id AS id, tm.menu_name AS title, tm.menu_url, tm.depth, tm.auth_seqno FROM tb_menu tm WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM tb_menu_auth tma WHERE tma.menu_id = tm.menu_id AND ( (#{u_type} = 'A' AND tma.member_type IN ('A', 'CUSTOMER')) OR tma.member_type = #{u_type} ) ) AND depth = 1 AND tm.parent_menu_id = #{parent_menu_id} ORDER BY tm.menu_seqno
